Package com.example.frontend.helpers

Class SessionManagement

java.lang.Object
com.example.frontend.helpers.SessionManagement
public class SessionManagement extends Object
This class was created for ease of access and control of a SharedPreferences object. Admins can use this class to interact with a SharedPreferences object without knowing how SharedPreferences works behind the scenes.
